Name: Frequency of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' compared to 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Percentage of manuscripts that proceed to 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' after 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities followed by 'SW-Reviewer Declined'
Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all review process activities
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' leading to a 'SW-EIC Major Revision' decision
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities per manuscript
Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities grouped by the last value of code

Name: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' followed by 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'

Name: Frequency of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' in the most common process variant
Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' followed by 'Unassign Editor'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'Unassign Editor'

Name: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities that precede 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'
Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' in manuscripts that exceed the Plagiarism Percent Match Threshold
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'Plagiarism Percent Match Threshold Exceeded'

Name: Frequency of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' in manuscripts that lead to 'SW-EIC Accept'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities in relation to 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due'
Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due' occurs

Name: Frequency of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' in relation to the total number of review activities per year
Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' followed by any activity related to major revision ('SW–Major Revision due in 1 week', 'SW–Major Revision due in 2 weeks', etc.)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all cases
